Package Controller

Class AccountModificationController

java.lang.Object
Controller.AccountController
Controller.AccountModificationController
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccountModificationViewController.AccountModificationViewControllerListener
public class AccountModificationController
extends AccountController
implements AccountModificationViewController.AccountModificationViewControllerListener
Handles account modification screen behaviour.

  • Nested Class Summary

    static interface  AccountModificationController.AccountModificationControllerListener
    Interface used to communicate with ScreenHandler, which is this controller's listener.

    • validateInformation

      public boolean validateInformation​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String passwordConfirmation)
      Checks whether all fields are valid, and highlights in red those that are not.
      Parameters:
      username - username that needs to be checked
      firstName - first name that needs to be checked
      lastName - last name that needs to be checked
      email - email that needs to be checked
      password - password that needs to be checked
      passwordConfirmation - password confirmation that needs to be checked
      Returns:
      TRUE if all fields are valid FALSE otherwise

    • validateModification

      public boolean validateModification​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String passwordConfirmation)
      If all fields are valid, modifies the user's info.
      Parameters:
      username - username
      firstName - first name
      lastName - last name
      email - email address
      password - password
      passwordConfirmation - password confirmation
      Returns:
      TRUE if all fields are valid False otherwise
